snippet: Roger Federer earned a record 32nd Grand Slam semifinal berth and will face Novak Djokovic on Friday. Fifth-seeded Jo-Wilfried Tsonga and Andy Murray also advanced.
abstract: Roger Federer and Novak Djokovic will face-off in men's semifinal at Wimbledon, their first meeting at the tournament and their first meeting on grass; Andy Murray and Jo-Wilfried Tsonga will meet in the other men's semi.
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer earned a record 32nd Grand Slam semifinal berth and will face Novak Djokovic on Friday. Fifth-seeded Jo-Wilfried Tsonga and Andy Murray also advanced.

headline.seo: Federer to Face Djokovic in Wimbledon Semifinal
headline.main: Federer-Djokovic Face-Off Set; Murray’s Battle Continues
headline.print_headline: Federer-Djokovic Face-Off Set; Murray’s Battle Continues
